import react, {useState} from 'react' import { TextField, MenuItem, InputAdornment, Button} from '@material-ui/core' import SaveIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Save' import styles from './styles' export default function DrugForm(){ const tiposMedicamento = ['Gato chiquito', 'Rata grande', 'Perros tontos'] const [nombre, setNombre] = useState('') const handleChange = (event) =>{ setNombre(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit = function(){ } return( <>

Hola este va a ser el formulario para registrar medicamentos

{tiposMedicamento.map((tipo) => ( {tipo} ))}
$, }} />
) }
